text: The 1935 Arizona Wildcats football team represented the University of Arizona in the Border Conference during the 1935 college football season. In their third season under head coach Tex Oliver, the Wildcats compiled a 7–2 record (4–0 against Border opponents), won the conference championship, and outscored their opponents, 218 to 45. The team captain was Charles Cochran. The team played its home games at Arizona Stadium in Tucson, Arizona. ==Schedule== ==References== Arizona Category:Arizona Wildcats football seasons Category:Border Conference football champion seasons Arizona Wildcats football team
title: 1935 Arizona Wildcats football team
